Package pl.polsl.michal.sadkowski.java1.sudoku.controller

package pl.polsl.michal.sadkowski.java1.sudoku.controller
Contains the main controller class, AppController, responsible for handling user input, managing the application flow, and coordinating between the model and the view.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pl.polsl.michal.sadkowski.java1.sudoku
     
    pl.polsl.michal.sadkowski.java1.sudoku.exceptions
    Provides the custom checked exception class, SudokuException, which is used by the model for error handling.
    pl.polsl.michal.sadkowski.java1.sudoku.model
    Contains the Model classes for the Sudoku application: Board, User, and the main wrapper class SudokuGame.
    pl.polsl.michal.sadkowski.java1.sudoku.view
    Contains the View class, ConsoleView, which is responsible for displaying output to the user and collecting raw input.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppController
    Simple controller: - if have args -> do task and finish - if no args -> simple REPL (print, set, get, clear, exit)
